thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: liz ferguson
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by liz ferguson

author: liz ferguson
title: liz ferguson
text: Perfectly planned every step of the way. From the moment we landed in San Jose we were taken care of. From our drivers to our incredible resorts, Caitlyn planned and organized the perfect Costa Rican adventure. We were even greeted by the travel agency on our way home with a bag of Costan Rican treats! Amazing service!
